title: Mbitr
author: Mbitr
content: Magazine Bundle Magazine Bundle up for sale - MAKE ME AN OFFER4 Magazines - 1 LOT- Time - 11th July 2011 - early Bitcoin Article - New Scientist 4th June 2011- early Bitcoin Articke - New Scientist 11th July 2011 - early Bitcoin Article - Bitcoin Money 2019 All magazines in vgcAll info available here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5148433.140Thanks to Crypto_CollectionYou can make an offer here or via PM

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Hi Mbitr Please allow a couple of questions From which country or continent are you shipping these items (any idea about expenses for delivery to EU/Italy?)This Is like an auction? What is a good price for starts offering?  However, lets start with a offer ... 0.001 btc plus shipping expenses on my own

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on September 29, 2022, 04:27:44 PMHi Mbitr Please allow a couple of questions From which country or continent are you shipping these items (any idea about expenses for delivery to EU/Italy?)This Is like an auction? What is a good price for starts offering?  However, lets start with a offer ... 0.001 btc plus shipping expenses on my own Hi , bitbollo Great questions  The mags will be coming from Euro zone - I sent a few mags this week euro to euro country and it was €8 to send - so should more or less the same  I do prefer auctions, but to be honest I had no idea what to start this at  Please be free to ask any more questions  And finally …..Thankyou for your offer, but it’s not quite what I was looking for Hope this helps and I’ll definitely do an auction format in the future as yes it avoids a lot of confusion

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Its actually nice to see some more magazines coming up for sale on the collectibles board.Those first 3 are actually very interesting being dated back to 2011, would actually be interestingto read what they were reporting back then.Two of the 4 are posted in that same thread on the first posthttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5148433.0

comments.author: Iced
comments.body: Could you send me the price range that you are looking for or you could disclose it here.I'm genuinely interested

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: SOLD Thanks for all the interest and feedback
